mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT L.SBJNO, J.NAME, S.NO , L.SEASONCODE, E.ROOMCODE, LISTAGG(E.DAYCODE, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.DAYCODE DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY L.SBJNO) AS DAYCODE, LISTAGG(E.TIMECODE, '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.DAYCODE DESC) OVER (PARTITION BY L.SBJNO) AS TIMECODE FROM SUBJECT J, STUDENT S, LECTUREAPPLY L, LECTURESCHEDULE E WHERE S.NO = L.STNO AND J.NO = L.SBJNO AND L.SBJNO = E.SBJNO AND L.SEASONCODE = #{seasonCode} AND S.NO= #{no}

SELECT* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.NO, T.TITLE, TO_CHAR(T.LIMITDATE, 'MM"월"DD"일"') LIMITDATE, S.NAME FROM TASK T, LECTUREAPPLY L, SUBJECT S WHERE T.SBJNO = L.SBJNO AND L.SBJNO = S.NO AND L.STNO = #{no} AND L.SEASONCODE = #{seasonCode} ORDER BY T.NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5

SELECT* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.NO, T.TITLE, S.NAME, TO_CHAR(T.ENROLLDATE, 'MM"월"DD"일"') ENROLLDATE FROM LECTURENOTICE T, LECTUREAPPLY L, SUBJECT S, STUDENT U WHERE T.SBJNO = L.SBJNO AND L.SBJNO = S.NO AND L.SBJNO = #{sbjNo} AND L.STNO = U.NO AND L.SEASONCODE = #{seasonCode} ORDER BY T.NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=2
